attributes.action: To continue to support road pricing policies and other sensible transport policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road pricing makes complete and utter sense - the more you use the more you pay.  The car is the destroyer of worlds - our world.  I would like to see this and other policies which reduce our dependency on the car and fossil fuel

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
